1.content: Which word is in your team name?
1.title: Team Name

11.content:
You are in the world of G4 MLP. The ram necromancer Gorgar has selected you to be the replacement for King Sombra and at first you clash with Queen Chrysalis, Lord Tirek, and Cozy Glow.

You are the second in command to Lord Vortech and his Legion of Doom (The Joker, Saruman, Lex Luthor, Lord Business, Two Face, Sauron, the Wicked Witch of the West and her Flying Monkeys, the Daleks, the Cybermen, General Zod, the Riddler, the Digital Overlord, Brainiac, Bane, and a Gauntlet Thief...or rather, you have to share your position with The Joker, who doesn't make it easy for you.

Taking place after Lego DC Supervillains, you command your Legion (The Joker, The Penguin, The Riddler, Harley Quinn, Catwoman, Two-Face, The Scarecrow, Clayface, Lex Luthor, The Cheetah, Solomon Grundy, Captain Cold, Malcolm Merlyn, Reverse Flash, Killer Frost, Mirror Master, Captain Boomerang, Deadshot, Poison Ivy, Gorilla Grodd, Sinestro, Black Adam, Condiment King, and Clock King) and have to keep Luthor in line while trying to humiliate the Birds of Prey.

You are snake sorcerer Solego and, after recruiting NegaDuck, Fat Cat, and Pete, you witness Ma, Big Time, Bouncer and Burger Beagle, Mark Beaks, Don Karnage, and Magica DeSpell turn on Flintheart Glomgold. Once they flee, you decide to gang press them.

You are a manservant to The Penguin whohas reluctantly given his manor as a base to The Joker's Legion of Horribles (The Penguin, Mr. Freeze, The Scarecrow, The Mad Hatter, Firefly, and Solomon Grundy.)
11.title: Legion

111.content:
There are two scenarios where you are a human pulled from your world:

You are a human mercenary that Grogar summons to replace King Sombra, along with your two "assistants" Kayla and Audrey.1

Or, you are a human turned alicorn who has been exiled by the princesses with your wings clipped...i.e. disproportionate retribution. Of course when Grogar gives you the suggestion demand to join his alliance, you jump at the chance.

Footnotes
1  See my story Feud for more details on those last two.
111.title: Grogar's Legion of Doom

113.content:
After doing Huntress's quest, you decide to make sure that the lesson she learned will stick, by of humiliation, a la Black Canary in Requiem for 4 Canaries.

But you don't trust Lex Luthor and must decide how to keep him in line before he does another mega triple cross.

So who's more important now?
113.title: Your Legion of Doom

12.content:
You have assembled a team of villains consisting of a samurai warrior, a SS officer, am Arab sheikh, a cowboy, and a scientist. Kind of like Mr Burns' League of Evil, but not only are all your members alive but you are in the world of The Republic of Doyle.

You have assembled a League of Gentlemen, consisting of Fu Manchu, Professor Moriarty, Colonel Moran, A. J. Raffles, Jack Griffin, Macheath, Bill Sikes, The Hoxton Creeper, Irene Adler, Jack Quartz, Arsène Lupin, Les Vampires, Rupert of Hentzau, Queen Tera, Doctor Nikola, and Doctor Mabuse.

You are the Chairman of the Acme Corporation and have almost every Looney Tunes villain under your employ. This being Looney Tunes, the success of your schemes vary. (Acme League: Yosemite Sam, Nasty Canasta, Cottontail Smith, Wile E. Coyote, Marvin the Martian, Elmer Fudd, Beaky Buzzard, Rocky and Mugsy, Pete Puma, the Shropshire Slasher, and Cecil Turtle.)

You are a baron in charge of a League of Monsters that includes The Frankenstein Monster, his Bride, Count Dracula, The Wolfman, The Invisible Man, The Gillman, Mr. Hyde, and The Mummy.

You are recruited into the League of Doom, which is something like Sue Sylvester's from Glee, insofar that its members are recruited by a high ranking faculty member and sometimes have unwitting participants. Its hobbies include sabotaging teams from rival schools, guarding their own school, hanging out, and securing the success of their members.
12.title: League

121.content:
You and the scientist are working undercover in the police force of St. John's in Newfoundland and Labrador as a cop and forensics examiner respectively. You have a bit of a rivalry with Constable Monica Hayward who is trying to get you fired; the feeling is mutual and you decide to return the favor.

But you don't like Nazis and having a SS officer on your team is out of the question. So you decide to send him on a mission he won't come back from, while using him as an example for the other members.

Who has a higher priority?
121.title: League of Evil

choices: Lock her in the closet while making sure she doesn't attract attention
1211.content:
You walk out of the precinct room with a cup of coffee, grumbling quietly. "Stupid Monica, stupid Monica." It was the aftermath of her umpteenth attempt to get you fired, and though you were left off without a scratch, you were still sulking at how she was able to make sure the evidence, which was successfully revealed to be fabricated, (thanks to your secret organization) wasn't traced back to her. So now it was your turn.

You happen to pass a holding room where they have thief Natalie Hurst in custody. You snort as you remember that Monica was tasked with guarding Hurst. "She's probably preparing some 'acceptance for promotion' speech or something." The thought of Monica getting promoted made you nervous, because if she got promoted, then she'd have easier means to run you off the force. Your scientist ally might have some influence if that happened, but you doubt he's be able to do much with you gone. "She might even have him committed." You shudder.

Eventually, you are sent to go relieve Monica. You enter the room...

...and are shocked to find Monica seated on the chair, her hands handcuffed behind her back and the chair, a cleave gag in her mouth, and stripped down to her bra and underwear. "What the hell happened?" You demand.

She glares at you and splutters into her gag, "Whaddya tink?!" When you snort in disbelief, she growls, "Comm on."

What do you do?

You have 2 choices:
1211.title: Monica Hayward

13.content:
Oh ho, now we are expanding our borders. There are going to be a total of five choices (and believe me, it was hard to narrow them down. I have a big imagination. Then again, that's what sites like these are four. To share your imagination. Anyway, let's get on with it.)

Disney and Marvel are one choice considering that Disney owns Marvel and there's too many teams from them to list here. The latter part also goes to DC.

The third choice is being a foot soldier aboard a ship that is the main mode of transportation for The Devious of Evil (Queen Chrysalis, King Sombra, Diesel 10, Diesel, 'Arry and Bert, Sailor John, the College of Crooks from "Cool McCool," Prince Froglip from "The Princess and The Goblin," and Katz and Le Quack from "Courage the Cowardly Dog"). You slowly work your way upward in the ranks and become the second in command under one of the superiors.

The United Underworld: you invite the heads of crime gangs of different nationalities to propose that they all unite as one hood, with the bosses as the board of directors; you are chairman of the board. You do allow one particular racist boss to opt out, then use him as an example.

You are a human that serves as a replacement member (and leader) of the Sodor Seven (D261, Vinnie, George, Arnold the first Horrid Lorry, Fred the Second Horrid Lorry, and Marv the Third Horrid Lorry) from "The Thomas Creator Collective."
You have 5 choices:
13.title: Other

131.content:
There are at least two versions of the Disney team up:

One is the Council of Disney Villains led by Maleficent (Hades, Jafar, Ursala, Captain Hook, Oogie Boogie, Pete, Scar, and Hector Barbossa).
Here you and your slave (Kula from Didnapper 2) are errand runners/messengers like Pete, obeying whatever order comes from Maleficent.

The other is the Overtakers led by Hades (Cruella de Vil, Yzma, Jafar, Scar, Ursala, Maleficent, Governor Ratcliffe, Dr. Facilier, and Chernabog.) Here you are a n above average mage and your slave (again, Kula from Didnapper 2 whom you defeated) are intimidated into helping him recover shards of a crystal that could assist him in world domination because... well, he's the Lord of the Underworld.

Fiendish Organization for World Larceny: an interesting twist here is that you, the only human in Duckburg, are a member of F.O.W.L., but as a double agent for S.H.U.S.H. Unfortunately, you've got the eye of Black Heron who is very determined to see you in your underwear.

On the Marvel side:

You are Kang the Conqueror and have just formed Chronopolis into the way it is in Lego Marvel Superheroes 2 (except maybe excluding Knowhere) and have assembled your Masters of Evil: The Presence, Attuma, Shocker, Mysterio, Kraven the Hunter, Doctor Octopus, Green Goblin 2099, Ulysses Klaw, Nathan Garrett, Man Ape, Baron Zemo II, Steel Serpent, the Red King, N'Kantu, M.O.D.O.K, Captain Corbett, and Hammerhead (you smelled Kingpin betraying you a mile away.)

You have 5 choices:
131.title: Disney/Marvel

1313.content: Are you male or female?
1313.title: F.O.W.L

132.content:
You are a Crime Syndicate member replacing J'edd J'arkus and have successfully usurped and banished Ultraman and Owlman respectively. You get their henchmen and henchwomen under your thumb with J'edd's right hand woman Angelique (Hawkgirl) by your side. You seek to make crime rise again behind the backs of your lowers (Superwoman, Power Ring, Sea King, Johnny Quick, Atomica, Grid, and Deathstorm) so to make it...not as dull and petty.

You are in The Phantom Zone when you spot Phyllis with the projector. You rally the other prisoners (Lord Voldemort, Sauron, the Gremlins, the Wicked Witch of the West and her Flying Monkeys, Agent Smith and his clones, British robots1, General Zod, Count Dracula, the Gillman, the Mummy, the T-Rex, the Velociraptor, Medusa, the Kraken, and King Kong) to steal the projector and escape.

You are The Joker and, with the help of Harley Quinn, have enlisted the services of Killer Moth, The Scarecrow, and The Mad Hatter to pull of a crime spree.

After watching a TV show about crime gangs, and hearing about a massive diamond haul, The Penguin (you) recruits Catwoman, Killer Croc, Bane, and Ragdoll to create an army of robot penguins to steal it.

Footnotes
1  ask your nerd friends
132.title: DC

info.brief_description: You are either the leader or a member of a group of villains...or not.
info.description:
Who doesn't love it when a team of villains comes together? Well now you can be part of a team.

Are you going to be a leader or a follower? Will you be honorable or traitorous? What will your goals be: world domination? Plain chaos? Usurp your leader? Destroying an enemy? Will you have a duel identity/double life, or will you just have the one life villainy?

The possibilities are endless, and you, my friends, can choose.

------------------------------------------------------------


Just a few rules before we began:
1. No vore.
2. Each path is going to have at least one character (you or an enemy) stripped down to the undergarments. It makes the defeat more humiliating.
3. No Adaptational Jerkasses or Villainy for characters that usually good guys. It can be used on characters that are neutral or already bad.
4. No on-screen sex. It can be mentioned, a chapter could with you and your lover getting into bed or open with you two in bed post-sex. But it can't happen on screen.
5. Any chapter that does brake these rules will be deleted.
6. Have fun
